Bkg Academy                  ,N/A,N/A,Shankar Nagar,"Street No. 08, New Shanti Nagar, Adjacent To Shankar Nagar, Raipur, 492001",Delhi, 492001,India,https://www.myprivatetutor.com/userfiles/centers/center1462602434.jpg,"Chemistry, Commerce Subjects, Economics, Mathematics, Physics","

column2: BKG Academy Raipur was conceptualised owing to continuous deterioration of the quality of formal education and the lack of necessary useful life skills. According to science, the entropy (disorder) of the universe is increasing, then the human society cannot remain unaffected but knowledge of the reasons of this disorder may lead to some solution, at least partially, if not completely. The entropy of our education system has also increased in line with the society at a very fast rate. This has resulted in the phenomenal growth of the number of so-called educated human-resource but from the point of view of quality or development in totality it is far far behind. BKG Academy Raipur is one such effort and experiment where, it is targeted to update the quality of education and skills of students by learned, experienced and dedicated team of experts in education and skills. BKG Academy is an Institute for Education and Skill Development under the Aegis of BKG Education Society, Raipur. The BKG Academy has full support of a team of Experienced and Dedicated Education and Skill Development Experts."
